author: Special Correspondent
text:
For the benefit of all assesses, the Corporation of Madurai has announced that the computerised tax payment counters in different locations in the city will remain open on Sundays and holidays till March 31.

According to a press release, Commissioner Sandeep Nanduri said that already several teams of officials were carrying out a drive against defaulters by disconnecting water connection and eviction process.

To carry out development works and to avoid unpleasant situations, tax payers have been requested to cooperate with the officials by promptly remitting property tax, water tax and underground drainage fee for the current fiscal.

Pension renewal

In another press release, Mr. Nanduri said that pensioners/family pensioners should appear personally before the officer concerned for renewal of the pension for 2016-17. They should furnish necessary documents, including bank passbook, colour photo, Aadhaar car and among others in person on all working days from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. at the ground floor of the Anna Maaligai.
title: Corpn. tax counters to be open till March 31
